name: Dragon Counter: MTG Life Total
description:
Dragon Counter offers the best way to track your life total and counters for Magic: The Gathering.

Features that you will love:

• Commander EDH damage tracking!
• Track poison, commander tax, experience, mana, storm and charge counters!
• Up to 6 players!
• Dark mode.
• Match history and sharing.
• Roll virtual dice.
• Battery-friendly.
• Intuitive gestures: tap, swipe, pan, long press.
• Sleek design and the fastest setup on the market.

We love Magic the Gathering! That's why we built the best counter tracking app for MTG.

Every feature revolves around minimalist design and ease of use. There's no complicated setup, just put your phone in the middle of your table and start playing!

Dragon Counter provides a dark mode which helps you save battery life, so you will consume as little energy as possible.

If you want to play EDH, we got you covered! You can keep track of commander damage in a clean, intuitive way. You can also see charts for in-depth information!

A simple long press offers a quick access to a wide variety of counter tracking, including poison, commander zone casting, experience, mana, storm and charge. Do you want to track counters just for yourself? We included a single player mode, where all the available screen space is just for you.

Experience the handy touch gestures. You want to increase life or counters faster? just pan your finger up. Move it down to decrease. Long press to choose counters or deal commander damage. It just feels good.

We love feedback. Listening to the community is one of the best things we can do to keep improving Dragon Counter. Our goal is to bring you the best, ad-free Magic tabletop utility, so don't hesitate to contact us if you have any suggestions!
